channel.title: PI Dupe - No Tutorial Found For The Particular One!
channel.description:
Well there is a dupe i found while fixing up my server today, it's a trading dupe for Project Insanity, there isn't a tutorial for this trading dupe that I could find. Here is how the dupe is being processed.
Take 1 Noted Item, any Noted Item. Next trade a player. Put the item into trade. Now right click the item your have in trade, and select, "Remove X". Then type in, "1". Now Hit enter. This places 1 of that item in your inventory and still leaves the other noted item in the trade, giving you 2 items, and you can continue doing this. If there is a tutorial for fixing this in particular, sorry for posting this, but please help me out. The only for for fixing a trade dupe i could find was one that including using a store in the dupe. If there isn't a tutorial, please help me out, this is very important.
-Thank you for your time.

item.title: PI Dupe - No Tutorial Found For The Particular One!
item.dc:creator: @kickyamom50 kickyamom50
item.description:
@kickyamom50 wrote:

Well there is a dupe i found while fixing up my server today, it’s a trading dupe for Project Insanity, there isn’t a tutorial for this trading dupe that I could find. Here is how the dupe is being processed.

Take 1 Noted Item, any Noted Item.
Next trade a player.
Put the item into trade.
Now right click the item your have in trade, and select, “Remove X”.
Then type in, “1”.
Now Hit enter.
This places 1 of that item in your inventory and still leaves the other noted item in the trade, giving you 2 items, and you can continue doing this.
If there is a tutorial for fixing this in particular, sorry for posting this, but please help me out. The only for for fixing a trade dupe i could find was one that including using a store in the dupe. If there isn’t a tutorial, please help me out, this is very important.

-Thank you for your time.
